description: React component implementing a calculator frontend with theme styling, display logic, and keyboard support.

methods.name: formatDisplay
methods.description: Formats the display value, trimming or converting to scientific notation as needed.

methods.name: isDigit
methods.description: Checks if a key is a digit (0-9).

methods.name: normalizeOperator
methods.description: Converts various operator symbols to standard form.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React component for the calculator frontend, managing state, display, and user interactions.
